title: Audio language
body: is there a way to keep all the readings as English (ex:the play button or "an ally has been slain") but change the audio to a different language? i just like the way Japanese audio sounds but i cant read Japanese obviously :3

replies.body: Ahhhh yea that'd be a pretty neat feature! Sadly we don't yet have a way for you to change the voice language but not the text language =\ .
